ygData.subject: Re: Items poliferation is a sword of damakle over Casters!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Warriors hitting for 70 when they are in their mid twenties is extremely rare. They might sometime get a critical hit that high. Or, maybe, if they are
ygData.messageBody:
Wizard wrote:
>
> From: Wizard <wizard@...>
>
> Same effect i have seen in mistmore .. grouping with many people i have
> seen what diference can make overpowered items... warrior hitting for 70 a
> hit it is 140 - 160 counting a bash ... without mana use a turn!!
>

Warriors hitting for 70 when they are in their mid twenties is extremely
rare. They might sometime get a critical hit that high. Or, maybe, if
they are twinked with the best of items, I might believe it. Otherwise,
I think you probably saw something rare and consider it a regularity.

You know, sometimes root holds all the battle and let's you med and fire
some more. Rarely, but sometimes. A warrior seeing this would go and
complain about the overpowered wizards. You have to take things with a
perspective.

--
Sergey
--

KPS, PUNK (Paramilitary Undercover Nuclear Kamikaze)
